title: “Big Ben” in Boone; CFB Grim Reaper; Pac-12 Vibrancy; Bumpy Bandwagons
description:
Rece Davis and Pete Thamel discuss their time in Boone, Rece signing a person’s face, Luke Combs’ professional beer chug, Appalachian State’s “Big Ben” moment, Arizona State firing Herm Edwards, candidates for the job in Tempe, Washington pushing around Michigan State, their most impressive teams for the weekend, bandwagons that could get shaky and Clemson skepticism. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Rece Davis, Pete Thamel
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Rece Davis & Pete Thamel look back on their time in Boone with Luke Combs for College GameDay, and recap Week 3 of college football
